description: Coverse helps teams streamline their daily operations and manage them in one single process.
title: All your team materials and content are in one place | Coverse
keywords: align team,annotate,brainstorm,brainstorming,collaboration,consolidate content,digital workspace,ideate,manage tasks,meeting,mind mapping,mood boards,notes,online meetings,online whiteboard,organize content visually,plan ideas,post-its,productive meetings,productivity,project collaboration,project management,projects,remote collaboration,remote whiteboard,task management,tasks,team alignment,team collaboration,teamwork,unify content,video call,video chat,visual collaboration,visual flows,visual planning,visual thinking,web conferencing,whiteboard,work together,write notes
introduction: Coverse is a collaborative platform that helps teams organize documents, streamline workflows, and improve productivity. It offers features such as real-time collaboration, task management, and visualizing files in a workflow. The platform provides security measures like encryption and GDPR compliance to protect user data.
features: Consolidate tools and manage files in one place
Automate routine tasks with AI teammate
Comment and markup documents in real-time
Built-in video chat for team collaboration
pricing: Pay per month or annually, and cancel anytime. Monthly: Free, Pro $4.75 per month billed annually, Enterprise contact for pricing.

faqs.question: Can I choose to pay monthly or yearly?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can choose to pay monthly or annually by selecting one of the options above the subscription plans. You will save 20% when subscribing annually.

faqs.question: Can I change my plan at anytime?
faqs.answer: Whether you are on Free or Pro, our plans are flexible and you can change your plan at any time.

faqs.question: How can I pay for Coverse?
faqs.answer: You can pay for your subscription using a credit card or bank transfer payments.

faqs.question: What is your cancellation policy?
faqs.answer: You can cancel your subscription at any time. If you want to temporarily pause your subscription, contact us.
